remarks: Lemma for uniqueness part of Projection Theorem.  Theorem 3.7(i) of [Beran] p. 102 (uniqueness part).  (Contributed by NM, 23-Oct-1999.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
chocuni.1 $e |- H e. CH $.
chocunii $p |- ( ( ( A e. H /\ B e. ( _|_ ` H ) ) /\ ( C e. H /\ D e. ( _|_ ` H ) ) ) -> ( ( R = ( A +h B ) /\ R = ( C +h D ) ) -> ( A = C /\ B = D ) ) ) $.
